meanings.definition: A mixture or blend of different elements
meanings.sent1: The chef created delicious amalgams of flavors in the stew.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting was an amalgam of colors and shapes.
meanings.sent3: The party was a fun amalgam of music and games.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like an amalgam of sunshine and rain.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a beautiful amalgam of flowers and herbs.

meanings.sent1: The team's success was due to the amalgam of skills they possessed.
meanings.sent2: The novel was an interesting amalgam of mystery and romance.
meanings.sent3: The joke was a clever amalgam of puns and wordplay.
meanings.sent4: His speech was an amalgam of passion and reason.
meanings.sent5: The building's architecture was a unique amalgam of old and new styles.
